constituent: afflicted, kebab, in, stick, mouth, heart, mouth2
koohiiStory1: A person who is afflicted with the vampire disease can only be killed with a sheesh-kebab through the heart.
koohiiStory2: If you are afflicted with severe heartburn, eating a spicy shish kebab will feel only slightly less painful than having it jammed straight into your heart.
myStory: đau đớn. bệnh tật. bị xiên tim
words: 患者(かんじゃ): a patient
